description:
# G√©n√©rer de l'audio de haute qualit√© avec Voxtral Small 24B 2507

Ce flux de travail int√®gre le mod√®le **notdaniel/voxtral-small-24b-2507** de Replicate pour g√©n√©rer du contenu audio √† partir des entr√©es fournies. Il g√®re l'authentification API, cr√©e des pr√©dictions, interroge jusqu'√† la fin, et sort le fichier audio final g√©n√©r√©.

---

## ‚ö° Section 1 : D√©clencheur & Authentification

* **üîò En cliquant sur 'ex√©cuter'** ‚Üí D√©marre manuellement le flux de travail.
* **üîë D√©finir la cl√© API** ‚Üí Stocke votre cl√© API Replicate pour authentifier les demandes.

**Avantage :** Connecte en toute s√©curit√© votre flux de travail √† l'API de Replicate et garantit que seules les demandes autoris√©es sont effectu√©es.

---

## üéõÔ∏è Section 2 : Cr√©er une Pr√©diction

* **üåê Cr√©er une Pr√©diction** ‚Üí Envoie une demande √† l'API de Replicate avec des param√®tres comme :

  * **audio** : Fichier audio d'entr√©e (par exemple, un √©chantillon de r√©f√©rence).
  * **max\_new\_tokens** : Nombre maximum de tokens √† g√©n√©rer (contr√¥le la longueur/la complexit√© de l'audio).

**Avantage :** D√©marre le processus de g√©n√©ration audio avec des entr√©es et des param√®tres configurables.

---

## ‚è≥ Section 3 : Interrogation & Suivi de Statut

* **üÜî Extraire l'ID de Pr√©diction** ‚Üí Capture l'ID de pr√©diction unique et le point de terminaison pour l'interrogation.
* **‚è±Ô∏è Attendre** ‚Üí Met en pause pendant 2 secondes avant de v√©rifier √† nouveau.
* **üì° V√©rifier le Statut de la Pr√©diction** ‚Üí Interroge l'API de Replicate pour voir si la g√©n√©ration audio est termin√©e.
* **‚úÖ V√©rifier si Complet** ‚Üí

  * Si termin√© : passe √† l'√©tape suivante pour traiter les r√©sultats.
  * Si non : boucle en arri√®re pour attendre et v√©rifier √† nouveau.

**Avantage :** G√®re efficacement la g√©n√©ration audio asynchrone, garantissant que le flux de travail ne progresse que lorsque les r√©sultats sont pr√™ts.

---

## üéß Section 4 : Traiter le R√©sultat

* **üìù Traiter le R√©sultat** ‚Üí Extrait et structure les donn√©es de sortie finales :

  * **horodatages** (temps de cr√©ation et de compl√©tion)
  * **audio\_url** (lien audio final g√©n√©r√©)

**Avantage :** Fournit une sortie propre et structur√©e qui peut √™tre utilis√©e dans des automatisations ult√©rieures (par exemple, envoyer de l'audio aux utilisateurs, stocker dans une base de donn√©es, ou partager par e-mail).

## üìä Vue d'ensemble du Flux de Travail

| Section                     | Objectif                         | N≈ìuds Cl√©s                                                               | Avantage                          |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |

## ‚úÖ Avantages Finaux

workflow.name: 4. Generate High-Quality Audio with Voxtral Small 24B 2507

parameters.content:
## ‚ö° Section 1: Trigger & Authentication

* **üîò On clicking 'execute'** ‚Üí Manually starts the workflow.
* **üîë Set API Key** ‚Üí Stores your Replicate API key to authenticate requests.

**Benefit:** Securely connects your workflow to Replicate‚Äôs API and ensures only authorized requests are made.

---

## üéõÔ∏è Section 2: Create Prediction

* **üåê Create Prediction** ‚Üí Sends a request to Replicate‚Äôs API with parameters like:

  * **audio**: Input audio file (e.g., a reference sample).
  * **max\_new\_tokens**: Maximum number of tokens to generate (controls audio length/complexity).

**Benefit:** Starts the audio generation process with configurable input and settings.

---

## ‚è≥ Section 3: Polling & Status Tracking

* **üÜî Extract Prediction ID** ‚Üí Captures the unique prediction ID and endpoint for polling.
* **‚è±Ô∏è Wait** ‚Üí Pauses for 2 seconds before re-checking.
* **üì° Check Prediction Status** ‚Üí Polls Replicate‚Äôs API to see if the audio generation is done.
* **‚úÖ Check If Complete** ‚Üí

  * If finished: moves forward to process results.
  * If not: loops back to wait and check again.

**Benefit:** Efficiently manages asynchronous audio generation, ensuring the workflow only proceeds when results are ready.

---

## üéß Section 4: Process Result

* **üìù Process Result** ‚Üí Extracts and structures final output data:

  * **status** (success or failure)
  * **output** (raw response)
  * **metrics** (generation statistics)
  * **timestamps** (created and completed times)
  * **audio\_url** (final generated audio link)

**Benefit:** Provides a clean, structured output that can be used in follow-up automations (e.g., sending audio to users, storing in a database, or sharing via email).

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# Generate High-Quality Audio with Voxtral Small 24B 2507

This workflow integrates the **notdaniel/voxtral-small-24b-2507** model from Replicate to generate audio content from provided inputs. It handles API authentication, creates predictions, polls until completion, and outputs the final generated audio file.

---

## ‚ö° Section 1: Trigger & Authentication

* **üîò On clicking 'execute'** ‚Üí Manually starts the workflow.
* **üîë Set API Key** ‚Üí Stores your Replicate API key to authenticate requests.

**Benefit:** Securely connects your workflow to Replicate‚Äôs API and ensures only authorized requests are made.

---

## üéõÔ∏è Section 2: Create Prediction

* **üåê Create Prediction** ‚Üí Sends a request to Replicate‚Äôs API with parameters like:

  * **audio**: Input audio file (e.g., a reference sample).
  * **max\_new\_tokens**: Maximum number of tokens to generate (controls audio length/complexity).

**Benefit:** Starts the audio generation process with configurable input and settings.

---

## ‚è≥ Section 3: Polling & Status Tracking

* **üÜî Extract Prediction ID** ‚Üí Captures the unique prediction ID and endpoint for polling.
* **‚è±Ô∏è Wait** ‚Üí Pauses for 2 seconds before re-checking.
* **üì° Check Prediction Status** ‚Üí Polls Replicate‚Äôs API to see if the audio generation is done.
* **‚úÖ Check If Complete** ‚Üí

  * If finished: moves forward to process results.
  * If not: loops back to wait and check again.

**Benefit:** Efficiently manages asynchronous audio generation, ensuring the workflow only proceeds when results are ready.

---

## üéß Section 4: Process Result

* **üìù Process Result** ‚Üí Extracts and structures final output data:

  * **status** (success or failure)
  * **output** (raw response)
  * **metrics** (generation statistics)
  * **timestamps** (created and completed times)
  * **audio\_url** (final generated audio link)

**Benefit:** Provides a clean, structured output that can be used in follow-up automations (e.g., sending audio to users, storing in a database, or sharing via email).

---

## üìä Workflow Overview

| Section                     | Purpose                         | Key Nodes                                                               | Benefit                          |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| ‚ö° Trigger & Authentication  | Start workflow & authenticate   | Manual Trigger, Set API Key                                             | Secure execution                 |
| üéõÔ∏è Create Prediction       | Submit audio generation request | Create Prediction                                                       | Start model processing           |
| ‚è≥ Polling & Status Tracking | Monitor prediction progress     | Extract Prediction ID, Wait, Check Prediction Status, Check If Complete | Ensures reliable completion      |
| üéß Process Result           | Format and deliver output       | Process Result                                                          | Clean audio result ready for use |

---

## ‚úÖ Final Benefits

* üîí Secure authentication with Replicate
* üéõÔ∏è Flexible audio generation using **voxtral-small-24b-2507**
* ‚è≥ Reliable polling until results are ready
* üéß Clean and structured audio output

---

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
